amendment.description: To set aside funds for cooperative agreements and laboratory support to accelerate the domestic production of Molybdenum-99.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2985 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 2. Record Vote Number: 133.

action.text: Amendment SA 2985 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4249; text: CR S4249) To set aside funds for cooperative agreements and laboratory support to accelerate the domestic production of Molybdenum-99.
